metadata.title: Disallow inbound firewall access to the SSH Server port.
metadata.description: If inbound SSH access is not needed, the firewall should disallow or reject access to the SSH port (22).

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Test for port 22 access over ipv4

ind:textfilecontent54_object.comment: Test for port 22 access over ipv4
ind:textfilecontent54_object.ind:pattern: ^-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT$
